name: ezsystems/ezplatform-redis
description: eZ Platform Redis Bundle provides support for serializers (igbinary) and compressors (lzf) for Symfony's Redis cache driver

suggest.ext-redis: This bundle works best with Redis for cache storage, php-redis 3.1.3 or higher needed, or Predis
suggest.ext-igbinary: Reduce size of cache items & improve unserialization speed
